Trade/Device Name(s): OneTouch Verio Reflect Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Electrochemical reaction with GDH-FAD Glucose Dehydrogenase
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Verio Reflect Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing electrochemical detection for capillary whole blood glucose measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip to aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
